title: Equipping Your Child to Succeed in College
itunes:author: Featured Guests: Michael Anderson & Dr. Timothy Johanson
itunes:summary:
In a recent study, only 8 percent of parents were confident their teen could schedule a doctor's appointment on their own. John and Danny discuss practical steps to prepare your kids to leave the house.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the book "GIST: The Essence of Raising Life-Ready Kids": https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2020-11-24?refcd=1032201

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/equipping-your-child-to-succeed-in-college/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
